text: @MarshaBlackburn Most COVID19 cases _are in the US_ due 2 Trump’s usual inaction/cries of “fake news”. But #COVID19 isn’t fake & now you’re living in disease. Trump & Giuliani told their @GOP Twitter followers 2 take antimalaria meds.1 voter dead. THIS is why Dems ignore the head moron. #WakeUp
